revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Dragonspiral Tower |image = [[File:Dragonspiral Tower.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Dragonspiral Tower. |tokens = 356,500 |location = Unova Route 7 }} '''Dragonspiral Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,203,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Dratini.png|40px]] Dratini || rowspan=13 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Tranquill.png|40px]] Tranquill |- | [[File:Basculin (Red-Striped).png|40px]] Basculin (Red-Striped) |- | [[File:Basculin (Blue-Striped).png|40px]] Basculin (Blue-Striped) |- | [[File:Vanillish.png|40px]] Vanillish |- | [[File:Sawsbuck (Autumn).png|40px]] Sawsbuck (Autumn) |- | [[File:Sawsbuck (Winter).png|40px]] Sawsbuck (Winter) |- | [[File:Beartic.png|40px]] Beartic |- | [[File:Mienfoo.png|40px]] Mienfoo |- | [[File:Mienshao.png|40px]] Mienshao |- | [[File:Druddigon.png|40px]] Druddigon |- | [[File:Golett.png|40px]] Golett |- | [[File:Golurk.png|40px]] Golurk |}
